title: What's the difference between 'ink' and 'toner'? Which is better to use for printing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ink is used for inkjet printers, and toner is used for laser printers. I find that laser printing is better, in the sense that I get a crisper print, and very important for me, no fading in sunlight, unlike an inkjet printed page. A toner cartridge is more expensive than an inkjet cartridge, but prints many more pages before running out. Also, a toner cartridge doesn’t dry out and become unusable if not used for a while, which is quite important for a home printer.
Same thing for different kinds of printers. Ink is for inkjets. Toner is for laser printers.
